changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE FUNCTION cch_calc_bbox(item_id VARCHAR(10)) RETURNS varchar AS $BODY$ SELECT cast(ST_Extent(bbox) as varchar) as bbox FROM ( SELECT b.bbox FROM bbox b, item i WHERE i.id IN (SELECT id FROM get_subtree($1) WHERE level > 0) AND i.bbox_id=b.id ) AS bboxen $BODY$ LANGUAGE sql;
